reference.shortdesc: The amendments element references a list of amendments or updates to the book.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: The amendments element indicates that an amendments list will be generated at that location. If the amendments element does not specify a resource, the amendments list is auto-generated by the processor.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The amendments element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample specifies that a change history list is generated in the publication frontmatter. The content of the change history list is contained in the DITA resource referenced by keyref.
If the amendments element did not reference a resource, the change history list would be auto-generated by the processor.
